name: Blorga
content:
Blorga was a Gamorrean who fought as a gladiator in a ritual battle in the Cauldron arena on the planet Rattatak in 22 BBY. During the battle, the Gamorrean fought the Aqualish Grunda Dolma with a staff. The Sith Lord Count Dooku attended the match, hoping to find a new apprentice, and Blorga fought in an attempt to gain Dooku's favor. While the count watched, the Gamorrean destroyed a Bugnaught combat droid before the Dathomirian Asajj Ventress arrived.
After Ventress entered the arena, Dolma and Blorga prepared to attack the newcomer, however, the Dathomirian used the Force to throw the pair back. Shortly after, the Gamorrean warrior stood next to a group of gladiators, and all were defeated by Ventress. Blorga had red eyes and green skin. While in the Cauldron, they wore two pauldrons, a metal helmet, a loincloth, and a chestplate.
Blorga first appeared in Chapter 6 of the Star Wars: Clone Wars micro-series, which aired on November 14, 2003. The character was named in Ultimate Sticker Book: Star Wars: Clone Wars, a sticker book written by Simon Beecroft and released in 2004.
